## bytesEqual() function

Compare two Uint8Arrays for equality. Equivalent to `buffer1.equals(buffer2)`<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function bytesEqual(a: Uint8Array, b: Uint8Array): boolean;
```
